name: Michael Kors Women's MK3131 'Runway' Chronograph Gold-tone Stainless Steel Watch
about: This women's watch from the Runway collection features a gold-tone stainless steel bracelet and gold-tone chronograph dial.  Case Material: Stainless steel | Case Size: 37 mm x 37mm | Case Thickness: 13 mm | Case Shape: Round | Case Back Type: Snap-down
